titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: CDS INTERCHANGE CONTROL COUNT - Description

div.p: CDS INTERCHANGE CONTROL COUNT is the same as attribute CDS INTERCHANGE CONTROL COUNT.

Usage: Senders of Commissioning Data Set Interchanges must generate this data. Recipients of Commissioning Data Set Interchanges are advised to recount the received Commissioning Data Set messages and match this control count to ensure all Commissioning Data Set data submitted has been correctly received.
